comment.author: 27604515@N04
comment._content: Stated by *sator* on theaerodrome.com: "Profile Publications # 68 the Thomas-Morse Scout shows two other planes like that .They were converted S-4C,s with 90 h.p. OX5 engines one was used in the 1924 "On to Dayton" race from Minot to N. Dakota and the other was used in the 1925 Ford Reliability Tour."
